title: [Question]DA Worksheet plagiarism check
content:
so this one person asked for my da worksheet in the last day saying she isnt sure of the answers  
n now she just changed her name n submitted

will i lose marks for plagiarism  
or will it be who submitted it first n all??  
any DA TA's can u plss clarify

comments.body: It'll probably be fine but don't do it again.  Sharing your answers is just inviting trouble.
if there is plag check , doesnt matter who submitted first ,doesnt matter whose is original, all the parties will be penalized.
There's rarely any plagiarism check apart from bd and cyber security subjects so u will be fine mostly
Only Big Data will have a major plagiarism check gotta be very careful. With DA you should be fine. From next time just change the answers a little
